Reviews.Content: stayed month vacation stayed hotels stayed porter bags bonus roomy clean abit tired looking bad breakfast plenty time 710am complaint staff didnt pay proper attention paperwork paid 6pm check locked 1pm tried charge extra late check overall stay central

Reviews.Title: “Great Experience”
Reviews.Author: vs_hi
Reviews.Content: soon enter hotel welcomed enchanting fragrance hotel bathrooms clean housekeeping toothe building regular type skyscraper somewhat colonial style adds style complimentary buffet breakfast american continental indian items indian restaurant courtyard reasonably priced quality hotel centre singapore close shopping little india locality facing courtyard exceptionally quiet bad wireless internet expensive

Reviews.Content: met family start holiday thailand 4th stay despite specifying double bed booking mentioning gay couple usual fuss 2 guys share bed lovely hotel run cared reception crew training time stay fuss giggles hoo ha 2 guys share bed reception staff else care management please talk reception staff

Reviews.Title: “Good location but tired rooms and inattentive service”

Reviews.Content: cost pretty inexpensive singapore located little india mrt mustapha walk immediately outside hotel excellent indian restaurant recommend highly check fine didnt exactly feel welcome smelled little musty decor tired tv flickered intermittently whatever channel watch latter hardly holiday lack care maintenance charging fortune internet plain petty summary decent drop head limited budget wouldnt look forward staying

Reviews.Content: husband stayed albert court october 2009 overall stay satisfying hotel clean adequate albeit expected historical building location heart little india street mrt short walk easy city nice feature internet lobby able write home rate restaurant opted cheaper option eating hawker center street looking stay outside hustle bustle orchard road albert court excellent option
